SPELL_ABILITY.TARGET_DEFINITION: local filter = Object():GetFilter() filter:Clear() filter:SetFilterType( FILTER_TYPE_PLAYERS ) filter:SetHint( HINT_ALLIED_ONLY, EffectController() )
SPELL_ABILITY.RESOLUTION_TIME_ACTION: local n = MTG():GetActionRepCount() local num_players = MTG():GetNumberOfPlayers() local playerindex = n/2 local parity = n % 2 local player = MTG():GetNthPlayer(playerindex) if player ~= nil and n < num_players*2 then if parity == 0 then player:BeginNewMultipleChoice() player:AddMultipleChoiceAnswer( "CARD_QUERY_TAKE_5_DAMAGE" ) player:AddMultipleChoiceAnswer( "CARD_QUERY_DO_NOTHING" ) player:AskMultipleChoiceQuestion( "CARD_QUERY_MC_BROWBEAT" ) else if Object():GetMultipleChoiceResult() == 0 then local source = EffectSource() if source == nil then source = Object() end if player ~= nil then player:DealDamage(5, source) EffectDC():Set_Int(0, 1) end return false end end return true else return false end

if (EffectDC():Get_Int(0) == nil) or (EffectDC():Get_Int(0) ~= nil and EffectDC():Get_Int(0) ~= 1) then local target = EffectDC():Get_Targets(0):Get_PlayerPtr(0) if target ~= nil then PlayerDrawCards( target, 3 ) end end
